adventurers.name: Mighty Torg
adventurers.description: Very strong with powerful melee attacks, Torg is also decently competent at ranged when he throws his axe.

adventurers.name: Ranger Rena
adventurers.description: Swift and strong, Rena is unmatched with her bow, but is not as skilled in melee.

adventurers.name: Sir Valan
adventurers.description: Chivalrous and stalwart, Sir Valan is a master of melee combat, but is very limited at range.

adventurers.name: Shadowstalker Velma
adventurers.description: Elusive and cunning, Velma is a master of stealth and can competently fight in both melee and ranged.

adventurers.name: Archmage Claus
adventurers.description: Physically weak, yet powerful and wise in the arcane. Archmage Claus is a master of magic and spell-casting.

adventurers.name: Timid Edgar
adventurers.description: While Edgar can poke things in melee with a small rusty sword, or use his slingshot at range, he would rather stay safe in the inn...
